Server¶

class server.Server(**kwargs)[source]¶

Main server class that interprets the config file and starts various threads

make_pick_list_calculations()[source]¶

Make calculations for TeamPickAbility based on TeamMatchData, SuperMatchData, and TeamCalculatedData

make_ranking_calculations()[source]¶

Pulls the current rankings from The Blue Alliance and predicts the final rankings

make_super_calculations()[source]¶

Makes all the calculations from the SuperMatchData

make_team_calculations()[source]¶

Make all the calculations from the TeamMatchData

on_tloop()[source]¶

Runs on each iteration of the main loop and aggregates the data.

on_tstart()[source]¶

Runs before the main loop and starts the threads for BluetoothServer, SocketServer, and ScouterAnalysis based on the config. Also, caches the firebase data.

set_matches(event_matches)[source]¶

Converts the match information pulled from The Blue Alliance into Match

Args:
event_matches (dict): The match information pulled from The Blue Alliance
Returns:
A dict contain all the match numbers for each team
set_rankings(event_rankings)[source]¶

Convert the ranking information from The Blue Alliance to the TeamRankingData

set_teams(event_teams, team_matches)[source]¶
Converts the team information from The Blue Alliance

to TeamLogistics.

Converts the team information from The Blue Alliance to TeamLogistics. Also, sets the match numbers for each team from the result of set_matches()
Args:

event_teams (dict): The team information from The Blue Alliance

team_matches (dict): The match numbers for each team

start()[source]¶

Starts the main thread loop

stop()[source]¶

Stops all threads
